## BlockSvg.toCopyData() method

Encode a block for copying.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toCopyData(): BlockCopyData | null;
```
**Returns:**

[BlockCopyData](./blockly.clipboard.blockcopydata.md) \| null

Copy metadata, or null if the block is an insertion marker.
